item.title: Audio Pro’s A10 MkII Wireless Speaker Available In Three New Colors
item.description: Swedish speaker maker Audio Pro has updated its A10 MkII speaker with new colors: grey, light grey and black. The A10 MkII supports Bluetooth, AirPlay...

item.title: Mythic Quest Season Four Tackles Work Life Balance With A Pregnancy
item.description: Season four of Apple TV+ hit show Mythic Quest tackles work-life balance through Poppy’s office pregnancy, with mixed results.

item.title: The Prototype: Trump Research Cuts Hit The National Weather Service–And Antarctica
item.description: Plus: The startups landing spacecraft on the Moon, re-engineering immune cells to fight cancer, why you should warm up your brain and more.

item.title: Google Will Delete My Gmail And Photos On April 3—How To Save Yours
item.description: Google is sending out emails warning some users their accounts will be deleted soon—here’s what you need to do to save yours.

item.title: How The Private Sector Is Leading In Support Of A 21st Century Energy Policy
item.description: The business case for clean energy is strong— and critical to economic competitiveness and security.
